name: MARGARETA
description:
you wake up in an unknown dungeon with no knowledge of how you got there. A duel smell lingers and the flicking lights leave a mystery to be unraveled, 

but you're not alone.

MARGARETA

Margareta is a psychological-horror based game, although the game fundamentally relies on both psychological-horror and comedy genre, it's a fun game that will leave you trembling in fear. While trying to escape, you must finding the right path, solve puzzles and hide from the frightening entity.
